hero_section.aria-label: Specialist, Designer, Developer, QA, Project Manager

history.title: Our Story
history.description_1: The Baza Skill platform will help you find a junior IT specialist, as each of our candidates has already completed an internship in practice.
history.description_2: In the project, graduates of IT courses, switchers, and students of technical universities practice creating real digital products in a team.
history.description_3: Each of the specialists presented here has experience in teamwork and project implementation, starting with requirements analysis and ending with release. They have tried themselves in different roles and are familiar with all the challenges and achievements at different stages of the project life cycle.
history.description_4: The Baza Skill platform will help you select an experienced IT specialist since each of our candidates has already passed a confirmed practice at Baza Trainee Ukraine and received our recommendation.

advantages.title: Benefits of working with us
advantages.card_1_text: During the standard onboarding procedure, specialization requirements are taken into account, candidates understand how the arrival of a new player affects the team. Developed product development methodology, communication standards, information search priorities.
advantages.card_2_text: Each candidate participated in meetings from product requirements to release. Our candidates understand interdependence of the team from each other, take into account the time needed for the work of other teams.
advantages.card_3_text: Each candidate has a proven track record of working with real technical tasks. All projects have implementation and perform a practical role for the customer. During the development, knowledge is also provided regarding the assignment of projects, SEO optimization methods, as well as after-sales service.
advantages.card_4_text: Each candidate can perform the role of a team leader for his team if he wishes. During practice, each candidate determines which strategy of behavior suits him better: an executor or a manager.

juniors-advantages.title: Advantages of juniors
juniors-advantages.subtitle: 3 GOOD REASONS TO HIRE JUNIOR
juniors-advantages.card_title_2: Economic feasibility in the long term
juniors-advantages.card_text_1: Juniors are usually highly motivated to develop and quickly adapt to new technologies and processes. They are open to learning, actively seek knowledge and strive to become valuable members of the team, changing it for the better. Also, they have no negative triggers in writing code or bug reports. Such a specialist is actually a blank sheet that the company can form to work for itself.
juniors-advantages.card_text_2: Young specialists are loyal to the employer company, work with enthusiasm, and are also ready to invest their time in learning and mastering the latest technologies. Often they agree to a lower level of pay and at the same time reduce turnover for the company. However, these conditions should be discussed at the start of the junior's work.
juniors-advantages.card_text_3: Inviting junior specialists to work is a successful strategy of companies playing the long game. The middle rank of specialists will move up the career ladder, freeing up places for newcomers. Therefore, a reserve warehouse, prepared and built on time, is an insurance against personnel errors in the future.

invitation.title: We invite you to cooperate
invitation.card1_text: Are you a recruiter looking for young talent for your IT company? On Baza Skill, you can find a junior specialist thanks to a flexible search system.
invitation.card2_text: Together we can reach new heights! Join our network of partners as an employer and support young people on their career path.

help.title: We will help you find a worthy specialist
help.paragraph_1: The Baza Skill platform will help you find an experienced specialist in the IT field, as each of our candidates has already completed serious practice at Baza Trainee Ukraine.
help.paragraph_2: Junior employee positions are an important element in the team of any IT company, as they are an invariable component of the personnel reserve. During the years of work, middle specialists move up the career ladder, eventually making room for replacements. So you should be ready for changes in the staff structure at any time.
help.paragraph_3: We provide you with skilled and well-trained junior specialists who love what they do.

Calculator.header: Interactive ROI Calculator for Comparing Junior vs. Middle Hiring
Calculator.header_popup: Interactive ROI calculator to assess the effectiveness of your investment in hiring Junior specialists versus more experienced Middle specialists. It takes into account salary, training costs, productivity, and onboarding time, helping you optimize costs and increase productivity.
Calculator.salary_text: Specify the monthly salary (in dollars) for the respective candidate.
Calculator.profit_text: This indicator reflects the added value the company gains through Junior's work. It is measured in monetary terms.
Calculator.education_text: Costs for Junior's skill enhancement, such as training, courses, seminars, or certifications.
Calculator.menthorship_text: This parameter shows how many work hours Middle spends checking Junior's work, training, or consulting.
Calculator.middleSalary_text: This is the cost of one hour of Middle's work, measured in monetary terms.
Calculator.profitLoss_text: This is the indirect loss incurred when Middle spends time on mentorship instead of their primary tasks.
